citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:00 a.m on
20-Feb-20.
Called contact number listed, waited 30 minutes. Owner returned call, was unable to accompany inspector, is not
currently operational. Discussed optimal hours, owner will contact inspector once operational.
